titles.title: Battery and Regenerative Braking Act
Battery and Regenerative Braking Act

To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide eligibility for projects to develop and implement regenerative braking and energy storage technologies under the consolidated rail infrastructure and safety improvements program, and for other purposes.
